trans-unit.source: Register a custom protocol and intercept existing protocol requests.
trans-unit.target: 注册一个自定义协议并拦截现有的协议请求。

trans-unit.source: Registering a scheme as standard will allow access to files through the FileSystem API. Otherwise the renderer will throw a security error for the scheme.
trans-unit.target: 将方案注册为标准配置将允许通过FileSystem API访问文件。否则，渲染器将为方案抛出安全错误。

trans-unit.source: Registering a scheme as standard, will allow relative and absolute resources to be resolved correctly when served. Otherwise the scheme will behave like the file protocol, but without the ability to resolve relative URLs.
trans-unit.target: 将方案注册为标准方案，可以在服务时正确解析相对资源和绝对资源。否则，该方案的行为将类似于 file 协议，但是无法解析相对URL。

trans-unit.source: Registers a global shortcut of accelerator. The callback is called when the registered shortcut is pressed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 注册 accelerator 的全局快捷方式。当用户按下注册的快捷方式时，将 callback 。

trans-unit.source: Registers a protocol of scheme that will send a Buffer as a response.
trans-unit.target: 注册 scheme 协议，该协议将发送 Buffer 作为响应。

trans-unit.source: Registers a protocol of scheme that will send a Readable as a response.
trans-unit.target: 注册 scheme 协议，该协议将发送 Readable 作为响应。

trans-unit.source: Registers a protocol of scheme that will send a String as a response.
trans-unit.target: 注册 scheme 协议，该协议将发送 String 作为响应。

trans-unit.source: Registers a protocol of scheme that will send an HTTP request as a response.
trans-unit.target: 注册 scheme 协议，该协议将发送HTTP请求作为响应。

trans-unit.source: Registers a protocol of scheme that will send the file as a response. The handler will be called with handler(request, callback) when a request is going to be created with scheme. completion will be called with completion(null) when scheme is successfully registered or completion(error) when failed.
trans-unit.target: 注册 scheme 协议，该协议将发送文件作为响应。该 handler 将被用 handler(request, callback) 当一个 request 是要与创建 scheme 。 completion 将被用 completion(null) 时， scheme 被成功注册或 completion(error) 失败时。

trans-unit.source: Registers the scheme as secure scheme.
trans-unit.target: 将 scheme 注册为安全方案。

trans-unit.source: Registers the scheme as secure, bypasses content security policy for resources, allows registering ServiceWorker and supports fetch API.
trans-unit.target: 将 scheme 注册为安全，绕过资源的内容安全策略，允许注册ServiceWorker并支持访存API。

trans-unit.source: Run npm run prepare-release -- --notesOnly to view auto generated release notes. The notes generated should help you determine if this is a major, minor, patch, or beta version change. Read the Version Change Rules for more information.
trans-unit.target: 运行 npm run prepare-release -- --notesOnly 查看自动生成的发行说明。生成的注释应有助于您确定这是主要，次要，补丁还是Beta版本更改。阅读版本更改规则以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Send a message to the main process asynchronously via channel, you can also send arbitrary arguments. Arguments will be serialized in JSON internally and hence no functions or prototype chain will be included.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 异步向主进程发送消息，您也可以发送任意参数。参数将在内部以JSON序列化，因此不包含任何函数或原型链。

trans-unit.source: Send a message to the main process synchronously via channel, you can also send arbitrary arguments. Arguments will be serialized in JSON internally and hence no functions or prototype chain will be included.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 同步向主进程发送消息，您也可以发送任意参数。参数将在内部以JSON序列化，因此不包含任何函数或原型链。

trans-unit.source: Send an asynchronous message to renderer process via channel, you can also send arbitrary arguments. Arguments will be serialized in JSON internally and hence no functions or prototype chain will be included.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 向渲染器进程发送异步消息，您也可以发送任意参数。参数将在内部以JSON序列化，因此不包含任何函数或原型链。

trans-unit.source: Send an asynchronous message to renderer process via channel, you can also send arbitrary arguments. The renderer process can handle the message by listening to the channel event with the ipcRenderer module.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 向渲染器进程发送异步消息，您也可以发送任意参数。渲染器进程可以通过使用 ipcRenderer 模块监听 channel 事件来处理消息。

trans-unit.source: Sends a message to a window with windowid via channel.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 将消息发送到带有 windowid 的窗口。

trans-unit.source: Sends a message to the child window with the specified origin or * for no origin preference.
trans-unit.target: 将消息发送到具有指定来源或 * 的子窗口，该消息没有指定来源。

trans-unit.source: Sends a message to the parent window with the specified origin or * for no origin preference.
trans-unit.target: 将消息发送到具有指定来源的父窗口，或将 * 发送给没有原始来源的首选项。

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to get all cookies matching filter, callback will be called with callback(error, cookies) on complete.
trans-unit.target: 发送一个请求获得匹配的所有cookie filter ， callback 将被称为 callback(error, cookies) 上完成。

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to get current zoom factor, the callback will be called with callback(zoomFactor).
trans-unit.target: 发送请求以获取当前的缩放系数，该 callback 将通过 callback(zoomFactor) 进行调用。

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to get current zoom level, the callback will be called with callback(zoomLevel).
trans-unit.target: 发送请求以获取当前缩放级别，该 callback 将通过 callback(zoomLevel) 进行调用。

trans-unit.source: Sends an input event to the page.
trans-unit.target: 将输入 event 发送到页面。

trans-unit.source: Sends an input event to the page. Note: The BrowserWindow containing the contents needs to be focused for sendInputEvent() to work.
trans-unit.target: 将输入 event 发送到页面。注意：包含内容的 BrowserWindow 需要聚焦，以便 sendInputEvent() 起作用。

trans-unit.source: Sends the action to the first responder of application. This is used for emulating default macOS menu behaviors. Usually you would just use the role property of a MenuItem.
trans-unit.target: 将 action 发送到应用程序的第一响应者。这用于模拟默认的macOS菜单行为。通常，您只使用 MenuItem 的 role 属性。

trans-unit.source: Sends the last chunk of the request data. Subsequent write or end operations will not be allowed. The finish event is emitted just after the end operation.
trans-unit.target: 发送请求数据的最后一块。随后的写入或结束操作将被禁止。在 finish 事件刚刚结束手术后发出的。

trans-unit.source: Set an extra parameter to be sent with the crash report. The values specified here will be sent in addition to any values set via the extra option when start was called. This API is only available on macOS, if you need to add/update extra parameters on Linux and Windows after your first call to start you can call start again with the updated extra options.
trans-unit.target: 设置要与崩溃报告一起发送的额外参数。调用 start 时，除通过 extra 选项设置的任何值外，还将发送此处指定的值。此API仅在macOS上可用，如果您在首次调用 start 后需要在Linux和Windows上添加/更新额外的参数，则可以使用更新后的 extra 选项再次调用 start 。

trans-unit.source: Sets menu as the application menu on macOS. On Windows and Linux, the menu will be set as each window's top menu.

trans-unit.target: 设置进度条中的进度值,有效范围为[0,1.0]。有效范围是[0,1.0]。

trans-unit.target: 设置在macOS上按下时与此托盘图标关联的 image 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the image associated with this tray icon.
trans-unit.target: 设置与此托盘图标关联的 image 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the application's dock menu.
trans-unit.target: 设置应用程序的停靠菜单。

trans-unit.source: Sets the certificate verify proc for session, the proc will be called with proc(request, callback) whenever a server certificate verification is requested. Calling callback(0) accepts the certificate, calling callback(-2) rejects it.
trans-unit.target: 设置证书验证PROC session ，该 proc 将被用 proc(request, callback) 每当服务器证书验证请求。调用 callback(0) 接受证书，调用 callback(-2) 拒绝证书。

trans-unit.source: Sets the context menu for this icon.

trans-unit.source: Sets the file descriptor soft limit to maxDescriptors or the OS hard limit, whichever is lower for the current process.

trans-unit.source: Sets the handler which can be used to respond to permission requests for the session. Calling callback(true) will allow the permission and callback(false) will reject it. To clear the handler, call setPermissionRequestHandler(null).
trans-unit.target: 设置可用于响应 session 权限请求的处理程序。调用 callback(true) 将允许该权限，而 callback(false) 将拒绝它。要清除处理程序，请调用 setPermissionRequestHandler(null) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the hover text for this tray icon.

trans-unit.target: 设置基于布局的最大和最小(即非视觉)缩放级别。

trans-unit.target: 设置最大和最小的缩放级别。

trans-unit.target: 将窗口的最小大小设置为 width 和 height 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the opacity of the window. On Linux does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 设置窗口的不透明度。在Linux上什么也不做。

trans-unit.source: Sets the pathname of the file the window represents, and the icon of the file will show in window's title bar.

trans-unit.source: Sets the referrer URL for the guest page.
trans-unit.target: 设置客人页的引用人URL。

trans-unit.source: Sets the region of the window to show as the thumbnail image displayed when hovering over the window in the taskbar. You can reset the thumbnail to be the entire window by specifying an empty region: {x: 0, y: 0, width: 0, height: 0}.

trans-unit.source: Sets the session used by the page. If partition starts with persist:, the page will use a persistent session available to all pages in the app with the same partition. if there is no persist: prefix, the page will use an in-memory session. By assigning the same partition, multiple pages can share the same session. If the partition is unset then default session of the app will be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置页面使用的会话。如果 partition 以 persist: 开始，则页面将使用一个持久会话，该会话可用于应用程序中具有相同 partition 的所有页面。如果没有 persist: 前缀，则该页面将使用内存会话。通过分配相同的 partition ，多个页面可以共享同一会话。如果未设置 partition ，则将使用应用程序的默认会话。

trans-unit.source: Simple fullscreen mode emulates the native fullscreen behavior found in versions of Mac OS X prior to Lion (10.7).

trans-unit.source: Since Chromium is quite a large project, the final linking stage can take quite a few minutes, which makes it hard for development. In order to solve this, Chromium introduced the "component build", which builds each component as a separate shared library, making linking very quick but sacrificing file size and performance.
trans-unit.target: 由于Chromium是一个相当庞大的项目,最后的链接阶段可能需要相当长的时间,这给开发带来了困难。为了解决这个问题,Chromium引入了 "组件构建",将每个组件作为一个独立的共享库来构建,使得链接速度非常快,但牺牲了文件大小和性能。

trans-unit.source: Since Electron uses Chromium for displaying web pages, Chromium's multi-process architecture is also used. Each web page in Electron runs in its own process, which is called the renderer process.
trans-unit.target: 由于Electron使用Chromium来显示网页，因此也使用了Chromium的多进程体系结构。Electron中的每个网页都在其自己的进程中运行，该进程称为渲染器进程。

trans-unit.source: Since WebViews live in the DOM, they can be created by a script running on your website even if Node.js integration is otherwise disabled.
trans-unit.target: 由于WebViews活在DOM中,即使Node.js集成被禁用,它们也可以通过运行在网站上的脚本来创建。

trans-unit.source: Since a major feature in electron is the ability to run node.js in the renderer process (making it easier to develop desktop applications using web technologies), the sandbox is disabled by electron. This is because most node.js APIs require system access. require() for example, is not possible without file system permissions, which are not available in a sandboxed environment.
trans-unit.target: 由于电子的主要功能是能够在渲染器进程中运行node.js（使使用Web技术开发桌面应用程序更加容易），因此沙箱会被电子禁用。这是因为大多数node.js API都需要系统访问。例如，没有文件系统权限就无法使用 require() ，而文件系统权限在沙盒环境中不可用。

trans-unit.source: Since communication between the processes is possible, a renderer process can call upon the main process to perform tasks. Electron comes with a module called remote that exposes APIs usually only available on the main process. In order to create a BrowserWindow from a renderer process, we'd use the remote as a middle-man:
trans-unit.target: 由于进程之间可以进行通信，因此渲染器进程可以调用主进程来执行任务。Electron带有一个名为 remote 的模块，该模块公开通常仅在主进程中可用的API。为了从渲染器进程创建 BrowserWindow ，我们将遥控器用作中间人：

trans-unit.source: Since rendering untrusted content in electron is still uncharted territory, the APIs exposed to the sandbox preload script should be considered more unstable than the rest of electron APIs, and may have breaking changes to fix security issues.
trans-unit.target: 由于在电子中渲染不受信任的内容仍然是未知领域,沙盒预加载脚本暴露的API应该被认为比其他电子API更不稳定,可能会有突破性的变化来修复安全问题。

trans-unit.source: Since v0.34.0, Electron allows submitting packaged apps to the Mac App Store (MAS). This guide provides information on: how to submit your app and the limitations of the MAS build.

trans-unit.source: Stabilization branches are always either major or minor version lines, and named against the following template $MAJOR-$MINOR-x e.g. 2-0-x.

trans-unit.source: Stabilization branches are branches that run parallel to master, taking in only cherry-picked commits that are related to security or stability. These branches are never merged back to master.
trans-unit.target: 稳定分支是与主分支平行运行的分支,只接收与安全或稳定相关的挑剔的提交。这些分支永远不会被合并回主分支。

trans-unit.source: That level of modularity and extendability ensures that all developers working with Electron, both big and small in team-size, are never restricted in what they can or cannot do at any time during their development lifecycle. However, for many developers, one of the community-driven boilerplates or command line tools might make it dramatically easier to compile, package, and release an app.
trans-unit.target: 这种程度的模块化和可扩展性确保了所有使用Electron工作的开发者,无论团队规模大小,都不会在开发生命周期的任何时候受到限制,不能或不能做什么。然而,对于许多开发者来说,社区驱动的锅炉模板或命令行工具之一可能会使编译、打包和发布应用变得更加容易。

trans-unit.source: The eval() method has precisely one mission: To evaluate a series of characters as JavaScript and execute it. It is a required method whenever you need to evaluate code that is not known ahead of time. While legitimate use cases exist, like any other code generators, eval() is difficult to harden.

trans-unit.source: The frameBuffer is a Buffer that contains raw pixel data. On most machines, the pixel data is effectively stored in 32bit BGRA format, but the actual representation depends on the endianness of the processor (most modern processors are little-endian, on machines with big-endian processors the data is in 32bit ARGB format).
trans-unit.target: 该 frameBuffer 是一个 Buffer ，它包含原始像素数据。在大多数计算机上，像素数据有效地以32位BGRA格式存储，但是实际表示方式取决于处理器的字节序（大多数现代处理器是低字节序的，在具有大字节序处理器的计算机上，数据是32位ARGB格式的） 。

trans-unit.source: The listener will be called with listener(details, callback) before sending an HTTP request, once the request headers are available. This may occur after a TCP connection is made to the server, but before any http data is sent.

trans-unit.source: The C++ code uses a lot of Chromium's abstractions and types, so it's recommended to get acquainted with them. A good place to start is Chromium's Important Abstractions and Data Structures document. The document mentions some special types, scoped types (that automatically release their memory when going out of scope), logging mechanisms etc.
trans-unit.target: C ++代码使用了大量Chromium的抽象和类型，因此建议您熟悉它们。Chromium的重要抽象和数据结构文档是一个不错的起点。该文档提到了一些特殊类型，范围类型（​​超出范围时会自动释放其内存），日志记录机制等。

trans-unit.source: The files in /chromium_src tend to be pieces of Chromium that aren't part of the content layer. For example to implement Pepper API, we need some wiring similar to what official Chrome does. We could have built the relevant sources as a part of libcc but most often we don't require all the features (some tend to be proprietary, analytics stuff) so we took parts of the code. These could have easily been patches in libcc, but at the time when these were written the goal of libcc was to maintain very minimal patches and chromium_src changes tend to be big ones. Also, note that these patches can never be upstreamed unlike other libcc patches we maintain now.
trans-unit.target: /chromium_src 中的文件往往是不属于内容层的Chromium。例如，要实现Pepper API，我们需要一些类似于官方Chrome的接线。我们本可以将相关源构建为libcc的一部分，但是大多数情况下，我们不需要所有功能（某些功能往往是专有的，分析功能），因此我们使用了部分代码。这些可能很容易是libcc中的补丁，但是在编写这些补丁时，libcc的目标是保持非常小的补丁，而chromium_src的变化往往很大。另外，请注意，与我们现在维护的其他libcc修补程序不同，这些修补程序永远无法上游。

trans-unit.source: The first 3 options are trace recording modes and hence mutually exclusive. If more than one trace recording modes appear in the traceOptions string, the last one takes precedence. If none of the trace recording modes are specified, recording mode is record-until-full.
trans-unit.target: 前三个选项是跟踪记录模式，因此是互斥的。如果 traceOptions 字符串中出现多个跟踪记录模式，则最后一种优先。如果未指定任何跟踪记录模式，则记录模式为 record-until-full 。

trans-unit.source: The following steps introduce a simple way to submit your app to Mac App Store. However, these steps do not ensure your app will be approved by Apple; you still need to read Apple's Submitting Your App guide on how to meet the Mac App Store requirements.
trans-unit.target: 以下步骤介绍了一种将应用程序提交到Mac App Store的简单方法。但是，这些步骤不能确保您的应用将被Apple批准；您仍然需要阅读Apple的“ 提交应用程序”指南，以了解如何满足Mac App Store的要求。

trans-unit.source: The installer generated with Squirrel will create a shortcut icon with an Application User Model ID in the format of com.squirrel.PACKAGE_ID.YOUR_EXE_WITHOUT_DOT_EXE, examples are com.squirrel.slack.Slack and com.squirrel.code.Code. You have to use the same ID for your app with app.setAppUserModelId API, otherwise Windows will not be able to pin your app properly in task bar.
trans-unit.target: 使用Squirrel生成的安装程序将以 com.squirrel.PACKAGE_ID.YOUR_EXE_WITHOUT_DOT_EXE 的格式创建具有应用程序用户模型ID的快捷方式图标，示例为 com.squirrel.slack.Slack 和 com.squirrel.code.Code 。您必须通过 app.setAppUserModelId API 为您的应用使用相同的ID ，否则Windows将无法在任务栏中正确固定您的应用。

trans-unit.source: The latest three release branches are supported by the Electron team. For example, if the latest release is 2.0.x, then the 2-0-x series is supported, as are the two previous release series 1-7-x and 1-8-x.
trans-unit.target: Electron团队支持最新的三个版本分支。例如,如果最新的版本是2.0.x,那么就支持2-0-x系列,之前的两个版本系列1-7-x和1-8-x也支持。

trans-unit.source: The main process creates web pages by creating BrowserWindow instances. Each BrowserWindow instance runs the web page in its own renderer process. When a BrowserWindow instance is destroyed, the corresponding renderer process is also terminated.
trans-unit.target: 主要过程通过创建 BrowserWindow 实例来创建网页。每个 BrowserWindow 实例都在其自己的渲染器进程中运行网页。当 BrowserWindow 实例被破坏，相应的渲染过程也终止。

trans-unit.source: The main process handles it by listening for channel with ipcMain module, and replies by setting event.returnValue.
trans-unit.target: 主进程通过使用 ipcMain 模块监听 channel 处理它，并通过设置 event.returnValue 进行回复。

trans-unit.source: The main process handles it by listening for channel with ipcMain module.
trans-unit.target: 主进程通过使用 ipcMain 模块监听 channel 处理它。

trans-unit.source: The main process manages all web pages and their corresponding renderer processes. Each renderer process is isolated and only cares about the web page running in it.
trans-unit.target: 主进程管理所有的网页和它们对应的渲染器进程。每个渲染器进程都是孤立的,只关心运行在其中的网页。

trans-unit.source: The main process script is just like a normal Node.js script:
trans-unit.target: 主进程脚本就像普通的Node.js脚本一样。

trans-unit.source: The main process, commonly a file named main.js, is the entry point to every Electron app. It controls the life of the app, from open to close. It also manages native elements such as the Menu, Menu Bar, Dock, Tray, etc. The main process is responsible for creating each new renderer process in the app. The full Node API is built in.
trans-unit.target: 主进程通常是一个名为 main.js 的文件，它是每个Electron应用程序的入口。从打开到关闭，它都会控制应用程序的寿命。它还管理菜单，菜单栏，Dock，Tray等本地元素。主要过程负责在应用程序中创建每个新的渲染器过程。内置了完整的Node API。

trans-unit.source: The method will also not return if the extension's manifest is missing or incomplete.
trans-unit.target: 如果扩展的清单缺失或不完整,该方法也不会返回。

trans-unit.source: The methods of WebRequest accept an optional filter and a listener. The listener will be called with listener(details) when the API's event has happened. The details object describes the request. Passing null as listener will unsubscribe from the event.
trans-unit.target: WebRequest 的方法接受可选的 filter 和 listener 。该 listener 将被用 listener(details) 时，API的事件已经发生。的 details 对象描述该请求。传递 null 为 listener 将取消从事件。

trans-unit.source: The most common case is to use template images for a menu bar icon so it can adapt to both light and dark menu bars.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的情况是使用模板图片来制作菜单栏图标,这样它就可以适应浅色和深色的菜单栏。

trans-unit.source: The most comprehensive tool to debug individual renderer processes is the Chromium Developer Toolset. It is available for all renderer processes, including instances of BrowserWindow, BrowserView, and WebView. You can open them programmatically by calling the openDevTools() API on the webContents of the instance:
trans-unit.target: Chromium Developer Toolset是调试单个渲染器进程的最全面的工具。它可用于所有渲染器进程，包括 BrowserWindow ， BrowserView 和 WebView 的实例。您可以通过在实例的 webContents 上调用 openDevTools() API以编程方式打开它们：

trans-unit.source: The name of the extension is returned by BrowserWindow.addDevToolsExtension, and you can pass the name of the extension to the BrowserWindow.removeDevToolsExtension API to unload it.
trans-unit.target: 扩展名由 BrowserWindow.addDevToolsExtension 返回，您可以将扩展名传递给 BrowserWindow.removeDevToolsExtension API来卸载它。

trans-unit.source: The native Node modules are supported by Electron, but since Electron is very likely to use a different V8 version from the Node binary installed in your system, you have to manually specify the location of Electron's headers when building native modules.
trans-unit.target: Electron支持原生的Node模块,但由于Electron很可能使用与系统中安装的Node二进制文件不同的V8版本,所以在构建原生模块时,你必须手动指定Electron的头文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: The native type of the handle is HWND on Windows, NSView* on macOS, and Window (unsigned long) on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 句柄的本机类型在Windows上是 HWND ，在macOS 上是 NSView* ，在Linux上是 Window （ unsigned long ）。

trans-unit.source: The newly created BrowserWindow will inherit the parent window's options by default. To override inherited options you can set them in the features string.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，新创建的 BrowserWindow 将继承父窗口的选项。要覆盖继承的选项，您可以在 features 字符串中进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The number of buttons in thumbnail toolbar should be no greater than 7 due to the limited room. Once you setup the thumbnail toolbar, the toolbar cannot be removed due to the platform's limitation. But you can call the API with an empty array to clean the buttons.
trans-unit.target: 由于空间有限,缩略图工具栏的按钮数量不应超过7个。一旦你设置了缩略图工具栏,由于平台的限制,工具栏是无法删除的。但你可以用空数组调用API来清理按钮。

trans-unit.source: The official symbol server URL for Electron is https://electron-symbols.githubapp.com. You cannot visit this URL directly, you must add it to the symbol path of your debugging tool. In the examples below, a local cache directory is used to avoid repeatedly fetching the PDB from the server. Replace c:\code\symbols with an appropriate cache directory on your machine.
trans-unit.target: Electron的官方符号服务器URL为https://electron-symbols.githubapp.com。您不能直接访问此URL，必须将其添加到调试工具的符号路径中。在下面的示例中，使用本地缓存目录来避免重复从服务器获取PDB。将 c:\code\symbols 替换为计算机上适当的缓存目录。

trans-unit.target: 目前唯一能安全加载原生模块的方法,就是确保Web Workers启动后,应用不加载原生模块。

trans-unit.target: 其他的建设步骤也完全一样。

trans-unit.target: type 选项的可能值和行为取决于平台。可能的值为：

trans-unit.source: The prebuilt ia32 (i686) and x64 (amd64) binaries of Electron are built on Ubuntu 12.04, the armv7l binary is built against ARM v7 with hard-float ABI and NEON for Debian Wheezy.
trans-unit.target: ia32 的预构建ia32（ i686 ）和 x64 （ amd64 ）二进制文件是在Ubuntu 12.04上构建的， armv7l 二进制文件是针对ARM v7，带有硬浮ABI和NEON的Debian Wheezy构建的。

trans-unit.source: The preload script can indirectly access all APIs from the main process through the remote and ipcRenderer modules. This is how fs (used above) and other modules are implemented: They are proxies to remote counterparts in the main process.
trans-unit.target: 预加载脚本可以通过 remote 和 ipcRenderer 模块从主进程间接访问所有API 。这就是 fs （上面使用的）和其他模块的实现方式：它们是主过程中远程对象的代理。

trans-unit.source: The preload script must be contained in a single script, but it is possible to have complex preload code composed with multiple modules by using a tool like browserify, as explained below. In fact, browserify is already used by electron to provide a node-like environment to the preload script.
trans-unit.target: 预载脚本必须包含在单个脚本中,但也可以通过使用像 browserify 这样的工具,让复杂的预载代码由多个模块组成,如下所述。事实上,Browserify已经被electron用来为预加载脚本提供一个类似节点的环境。

trans-unit.source: The prepare release script will do the following: 1. Check if a release is already in process and if so it will halt. 2. Create a release branch. 3. Bump the version number in several files. See this bump commit for an example. 4. Create a draft release on GitHub with auto-generated release notes. 5. Push the release branch. 6. Call the APIs to run the release builds.
trans-unit.target: 准备发布脚本将执行以下操作：1.检查发布是否已在进行中，如果停止，则它将停止。2.创建一个发布分支。3.将版本号合并到几个文件中。有关示例，请参见此凹凸提交。4.使用自动生成的发行说明在GitHub上创建发行草案。5.推动释放分支。6.调用API以运行发行版。

trans-unit.source: The process is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 这个过程如下:

trans-unit.source: The proxy has limited standard functionality implemented to be compatible with traditional web pages. For full control of the new window you should create a BrowserWindow directly.
trans-unit.target: 代理具有有限的标准功能，实现了与传统网页兼容的功能。为了完全控制新窗口，您应该直接创建 BrowserWindow 。

trans-unit.source: The renderer process can handle the message by listening to channel with the ipcRenderer module.
trans-unit.target: 渲染器进程可以通过使用 ipcRenderer 模块监听 channel 来处理消息。

trans-unit.source: The renderer process is a browser window in your app. Unlike the main process, there can be multiple of these and each is run in a separate process. They can also be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 渲染器进程是应用程序中的一个浏览器窗口。与主进程不同,可以有多个渲染器,每个渲染器都在一个单独的进程中运行。它们也可以被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: The renderer process is no different than a normal web page, except for the extra ability to use node modules:
trans-unit.target: 渲染器的过程和普通的网页没有什么不同,只是多了使用节点模块的能力。

trans-unit.source: The source code of Electron is separated into a few parts, mostly following Chromium on the separation conventions.
trans-unit.target: Electron的源码被分成了几个部分,在分离惯例上大多遵循Chromium。

trans-unit.source: The string follows the same format as the features string in window.open. A name by itself is given a true boolean value. A preference can be set to another value by including an =, followed by the value. Special values yes and 1 are interpreted as true, while no and 0 are interpreted as false.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串与 window.open 中的功能字符串采用相同的格式。名称本身会被赋予一个 true 布尔值。可以通过在其后包含 = 来将首选项设置为另一个值。特殊值 yes 和 1 解释为 true ，而 no 和 0 解释为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The structure of a renamed app would be like:
trans-unit.target: 重命名的应用的结构会是这样的。

trans-unit.source: The trace option will first be reset to the default option (record_mode set to record-until-full, enable_sampling and enable_systrace set to false) before options parsed from traceOptions are applied on it.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪选项首先会被重置为默认选项（ record_mode 设置为 record-until-full ， enable_sampling 和 enable_systrace 设置为 false 的解析选项之前） traceOptions 就可以被应用。

trans-unit.source: The two most important pieces of information needed to evaluate the report are a description of the bug and a simple test case to recreate it. It easier to fix a bug if it can be reproduced.
trans-unit.target: 评估报告所需的两个最重要的信息是对bug的描述和重现bug的简单测试案例。如果能够重现错误,则更容易修复错误。

trans-unit.source: The usage is similar to the other register{Any}Protocol, except that the callback should be called with either a Readable object or an object that has the data, statusCode, and headers properties.
trans-unit.target: 用法与其他 register{Any}Protocol 相似，不同之处在于应使用 Readable 对象或具有 data ， statusCode 和 headers 属性的对象来调用 callback 。

trans-unit.source: The usage is the same with the certificate-error event of app.
trans-unit.target: 用法与 app 的 certificate-error 事件相同。

trans-unit.source: The usage is the same with the login event of app.
trans-unit.target: 用法与 app 的 login 事件相同。

trans-unit.source: The usage is the same with the select-client-certificate event of app.
trans-unit.target: 用法与 app 的 select-client-certificate 事件相同。

trans-unit.source: The usage is the same with registerFileProtocol, except that the callback should be called with a redirectRequest object that has the url, method, referrer, uploadData and session properties.
trans-unit.target: 用法与 registerFileProtocol 相同，除了应使用具有 url ， method ， referrer ， uploadData 和 session 属性的 redirectRequest 对象调用 callback 。

trans-unit.source: The usage is the same with registerFileProtocol, except that the callback should be called with either a Buffer object or an object that has the data, mimeType, and charset properties.
trans-unit.target: 用法与 registerFileProtocol 相同，不同之处在于应使用 Buffer 对象或具有 data ， mimeType 和 charset 属性的对象调用 callback 。

trans-unit.source: The usage is the same with registerFileProtocol, except that the callback should be called with either a String or an object that has the data, mimeType, and charset properties.
trans-unit.target: 用法与 registerFileProtocol 相同，不同之处在于应使用 String 或具有 data ， mimeType 和 charset 属性的对象调用 callback 。

trans-unit.source: The usage of selenium-webdriver with Electron is the same with upstream, except that you have to manually specify how to connect chrome driver and where to find Electron's binary:
trans-unit.target: selenium-webdriver 与Electron 的用法与上游相同，不同之处在于您必须手动指定如何连接chrome驱动程序以及在何处找到Electron的二进制文件：

trans-unit.source: The user tasks will still show even after your application closes, so the icon and program path specified for a task should exist until your application is uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 即使在您的应用程序关闭后,用户任务仍然会显示,因此为任务指定的图标和程序路径应该存在,直到您的应用程序被卸载。

trans-unit.source: The vast majority of Node.js modules are not native. Only 400 out of the ~650.000 modules are native. However, if you do need native modules, please consult this guide on how to recompile them for Electron.
trans-unit.target: 绝大多数Node.js模块不是本机的。〜650.000模块中只有400个是本地模块。但是，如果确实需要本机模块，请参阅本指南，了解如何为Electron重新编译它们。

trans-unit.source: The version update process is detailed explicitly in our Versioning Doc.
trans-unit.target: 版本更新过程在我们的Versioning Doc中有明确的详细说明。

trans-unit.source: The workflow to format your changed code:
trans-unit.target: 格式化你修改后的代码的工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Then execute Electron.app (or electron on Linux, electron.exe on Windows), and Electron will start as your app. The electron directory will then be your distribution to deliver to final users.
trans-unit.target: 然后执行 Electron.app （或 electron 在Linux上， electron.exe 在Windows上），以及电子将开始为您的应用程序。该 electron 则目录将是你的发行版交付给最终用户。

trans-unit.source: Then file a bug at Electron's issues list, and describe which part of the extension is not working as expected.
trans-unit.target: 然后在Electron的问题列表中提交一个bug,并描述扩展的哪个部分没有按照预期工作。

trans-unit.source: Then manually create distributions for each platform and upload them:
trans-unit.target: 然后手动为每个平台创建分发并上传。

trans-unit.source: Then, assuming that the Xcode 6.4 DMG has been mounted at /Volumes/Xcode and that your Xcode 8.2.1 install is at /Applications/Xcode.app, run:
trans-unit.target: 然后，假设已将Xcode 6.4 DMG安装在 /Volumes/Xcode 上，并且您的Xcode 8.2.1安装在 /Applications/Xcode.app 上，请运行：

trans-unit.source: Then, create a virtual xvfb screen and export an environment variable called DISPLAY that points to it. Chromium in Electron will automatically look for $DISPLAY, so no further configuration of your app is required. This step can be automated with Paul Betts's xvfb-maybe: Prepend your test commands with xvfb-maybe and the little tool will automatically configure xvfb, if required by the current system. On Windows or macOS, it will do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 然后，创建一个虚拟的xvfb屏幕并导出一个指向它的名为DISPLAY的环境变量。Electron中的Chromium会自动寻找 $DISPLAY ，因此不需要进一步配置您的应用程序。可以使用Paul Betts的xvfb-maybe自动执行此步骤：在测试命令前加上 xvfb-maybe ，如果当前系统需要，小工具将自动配置xvfb。在Windows或macOS上，它什么也不做。

trans-unit.source: Then, go and install the electron-windows-store CLI:
trans-unit.target: 然后，去安装 electron-windows-store CLI：

trans-unit.source: Then, in the main process, augment the event with a path to the file that is being dragged and an icon.
trans-unit.target: 然后,在主进程中,用被拖动的文件的路径和图标来增强事件。

trans-unit.source: Then, in your Electron app, require and use the module as if you were building a Node.js application:
trans-unit.target: 然后,在你的Electron应用程序中,要求并使用该模块,就像你正在构建一个Node.js应用程序一样。

trans-unit.source: Then, in your test suite, you can use your test-driver as follows:
trans-unit.target: 然后,在你的测试套件中,你可以使用你的测试驱动,如下所示。

trans-unit.source: Then, open up Visual Studio. Electron is not built with Visual Studio and hence does not contain a project file - you can however open up the source code files "As File", meaning that Visual Studio will open them up by themselves. You can still set breakpoints - Visual Studio will automatically figure out that the source code matches the code running in the attached process and break accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 然后,打开Visual Studio。Electron不是用Visual Studio构建的,因此不包含项目文件--不过你可以将源代码文件 "作为文件 "打开,这意味着Visual Studio会自己打开它们。你仍然可以设置断点--Visual Studio会自动找出源代码与所附进程中运行的代码相匹配,并据此进行断点。

trans-unit.source: Then, run Electron with electron/spec as the argument:
trans-unit.target: 然后，以 electron/spec 作为参数运行Electron ：

trans-unit.source: Then, run the installation of the Desktop App Converter, passing in the location of the Windows base Image (downloaded as BaseImage-14316.wim), by calling .\DesktopAppConverter.ps1 -Setup -BaseImage .\BaseImage-14316.wim.
trans-unit.target: 然后，通过调用 .\DesktopAppConverter.ps1 -Setup -BaseImage .\BaseImage-14316.wim 运行Desktop App Converter的安装，并传入Windows基本映像（下载为 BaseImage-14316.wim ）的位置。

trans-unit.source: Then, start Electron:
trans-unit.target: 然后,开始电子。

trans-unit.source: Then, you need to prepare three entitlements files.
trans-unit.target: 然后,你需要准备三个权利文件。

trans-unit.source: Then, you'll need to configure your in-app purchases in iTunes Connect, and include details such as name, pricing, and description that highlights the features and functionality of your in-app purchase.
trans-unit.target: 然后,你需要在iTunes Connect中配置你的应用内购买,并包含名称、价格和描述等细节,突出你的应用内购买的特点和功能。

trans-unit.source: This will make a window maintain an aspect ratio. The extra size allows a developer to have space, specified in pixels, not included within the aspect ratio calculations. This API already takes into account the difference between a window's size and its content size.

trans-unit.source: Though asar archives are treated as directories, there are no actual directories in the filesystem, so you can never set the working directory to directories in asar archives. Passing them as the cwd option of some APIs will also cause errors.

trans-unit.source: To enable OS-enforced sandbox on BrowserWindow or webview process with sandbox:true without causing entire app to be in sandbox, --enable-mixed-sandbox command-line argument must be passed to electron. This option is currently only supported on macOS and Windows.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 sandbox:true 在 BrowserWindow 或 webview 进程上启用操作系统强制的沙箱，而又不使整个应用程序都处于沙箱中，必须将 --enable-mixed-sandbox 命令行参数传递给electronic。当前仅在macOS和Windows上支持此选项。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your C++ is in compliance with the Electron coding style, run npm run lint-cpp, which runs a cpplint script. We recommend that you use clang-format and prepared a short tutorial.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your JavaScript is in compliance with the Electron coding style, run npm run lint-js, which will run standard against both Electron itself as well as the unit tests. If you are using an editor with a plugin/addon system, you might want to use one of the many StandardJS addons to be informed of coding style violations before you ever commit them.
trans-unit.target: 为了确保您的JavaScript符合Electron编码风格，请运行 npm run lint-js ，它将针对Electron本身以及单元测试运行 standard 。如果您使用的是带有插件/附件系统的编辑器，则在提交它们之前，可能想使用许多StandardJS附件之一来了解编码风格违规。

trans-unit.source: To finish debugging at this point, run process continue. You can also continue until a certain line is hit in this thread (thread until 100). This command will run the thread in the current frame till it reaches line 100 in this frame or stops if it leaves the current frame.
trans-unit.target: 要在这一点上完成调试，请运行 process continue 。您也可以继续，直到在该线程中击中某行为 thread until 100 （线程直到100）。该命令将在当前帧中运行线程，直到线程到达该帧的第100行，或者如果线程离开当前帧则停止。
